children.text: Step 1: Clear local store values by clicking on relevant button Step 2: Use promise.all function to trigger sequential store values and display content in respective widgets (date, phone#, name, location etc...) Step 3: Use then/catch block to trigger second set of sequential store value to display content. (This function only triggers store value in catch block) Step 4: Trigger API run to see dynamic data on displayed widgets
Step 4: Value is <b>{{Select1.selectedOptionLabel}}<b/> and will default to {{appsmith.store.selected}}

Step 1: Modify Switch widget toggle to off Step 2: Modify dropdown option from Green to any another option Step 3: Move to page 4 on the table widget Step 4: Hit the play button on the Audio widget to trigger actions
